sentences.sentence: Glory is the adumbration of advantage.
Bridge,. Edifice,. Floor body adumbration,. Step street air corridor,. AD brand and so on, city bright change the first choice of construction product.
sentences.translation: 广泛用于公园、护栏、桥梁、大厦、楼体轮廓、跨街空中走廊、广告招牌等，是城市亮化工程的首选产品。

sentences.sentence: Comprehensive used for park, fencing wall, bridge, edifice, floor body adumbration, step street air corridor, AD brand and so on, city bright change the first choice of construction product.
sentences.translation: 广泛用于公园、护栏、桥梁、大厦、楼体轮廓、跨街空中走廊、广告招牌等，是城市亮化工程的首选产品。
